docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files. Publish this to Github Pages mkdocs gh-deploy will publish whatever the branch you are currently working on. It will probably be cool to have a GitHub action.
docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs

docs.text: Getting Started This file how to program in ESP-01. Configure Arduino IDE Click Ctrl+, to open the configuration. Paste https://arduino.esp8266.com/stable/package_esp8266com_index.json into Additional Boards Manager URLs. Then, at Tools > Boards > Boards manager you can download the board. Don't forget to put the board as aa esp8266!
docs.title: Getting Started
